means: 坚持不懈地，坚定不移地

sentence.Network_en: First, it is necessary to consolidate and develop unswervingly the public sector of the economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一, 必须毫不动摇地巩固和发展公有制经济.

sentence.Network_en: The Chinese government will unswervingly implement the opening - up policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国政府将坚定不移地实行 对外开放 政策.

sentence.Network_en: China will unswervingly follow a win - win strategy of opening up.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国将始终不渝奉行互利共赢的开放战略.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 中级口译翻译教材第二版词汇(9) ... 多层次 multi-tiered 坚定不移地 unswervingly;firmly 宽领域 wide-ranging.
...一诺千金有诺必践 Commitment should always be kept.一如既往 unswervingly和衷共济 solidarity; fighting together with one accord.
teacher娟日志 - 青岛姑娘 -... ... 时代使命 the mission of the era 矢志不渝 unswervingly 昂扬斗志 high morale.
... 深化体制改革—— deepen institutional reform 毫不动摇地—— unswervingly 公有制经济—— public sector of the economy.

list.abs: follow undeviatingly 一贯地从事…follow unswervingly 忠实地跟随follow wistfully 令人渴望地从事
the basic line must be followed unswervingly ., 基本路线要管一百年.
Li stressed that China will continue to unswervingly implement the basic national policy of opening - up ., 李克强强调 , 中国将继续坚定不移地执行对外开放的基本国策.
china will unswervingly follow a win - win strategy of opening up ., 中国将始终不渝奉行互利共赢的开放战略.
unswervingly follow the path of scientific development ., 坚定不移地走科学发展的道路.

means.word_mean: 1. in a constant and steadfast manner;
2. without swerving; in a direct and unswerving manner;

sentences.sentence: "the ship travelled unswervingly through the night"

auth_sentence.content: He is unswervingly devoted to the idea that the explanation of "miracle" is, ipso facto, false.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is unswervingly devoted to the idea that the explanation of "miracle" is, ipso facto, false.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is unswervingly devoted to the idea that the explanation of "miracle" is, ipso facto, false.

auth_sentence.content: While his erstwhile spouse and fellow criminal Vicky Pryce stared unswervingly ahead, Huhne would leisurely survey the scene.
auth_sentence.res_content: While his erstwhile spouse and fellow criminal Vicky Pryce stared unswervingly ahead, Huhne would leisurely survey the scene.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: While his erstwhile spouse and fellow criminal Vicky Pryce stared unswervingly ahead, Huhne would leisurely survey the scene.
